FuncDef: This command defines the Emulated Circuit Identifiers (ECID) to be used for the remote (destination) end of the circuit emulation service.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the value to be used as the remote (destination) ECID for the circuit emulation service. Upon CES packet reception, the ECID in the packet will be compared to the configured local-ecid value. These must match for the packet payload to be used for the TDM circuit. The remote-ecid value is inserted into the MEF-8 CES packet to be transmitted. Values-0 to 1048575.
